channel.title: Projects on James writes about food
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on James writes about food

item.title: Brine fermented cabbage
item.description: Ingredients 1 head napa cabbage (Chinese cabbage) salt Equipment A plastic or glass container of jar, large enough to fit the cabbage Digital weighing scales Process Split the cabbage into quarters. I like to cut half nearest the stem with a knife, then tear the leaf half apart. Place the container on the weighing scales and tare it Put the cabbage in the container, add just enough water to cover.
